root.name: @Field
root.description: Overview@Field is a golf game developed and published by Sonic Powered for the PlayStation Vita platform.Gameplay@field is a game that plays like a mixture between a miniature golf game and a game like Super Monkey Ball. Once the player hits the ball with the golf club, the Vita can then be tilted to try and maneuver the ball through the games over the top courses.

similar_games.game: Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds
Hot Shots Tennis: Get a Grip
